title: [Self-Directed] Precision Teaching-Based Online Course for Enhancing Statistical Learning Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of introductory statistical concepts and simple statistical analysis
context.additional_context: A training program for working adults with limited mathematical backgrounds to strengthen statistical application skills, leveraging the increased acceptance of online learning post-COVID-19.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core statistical concepts (descriptive statistics, inferential statistics, etc.) with over 80% accuracy through eight online learning episodes
Learners improve proficiency in solving statistical problems by over 20% through formative assessments for each episode
Learners improve statistical calculation speed by 30% compared to baseline through practice applying frequency-based precision teaching methods
Learners achieve a score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) on a confidence survey regarding statistical application at the end of the course
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
